code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./sidebarUI.css';import fullLogo from'../assets/logo_full.png';import iconLogo from'../assets/logo_icon.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Sidebar_UI(){const[isCollapsed,setIsCollapsed]=useState(false);const toggleSidebar=()=>{setIsCollapsed(!isCollapsed);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`sidebar ${isCollapsed?'collapsed':''}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:isCollapsed?iconLogo:fullLogo,alt:"Logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"/overview",className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-overview"}),!isCollapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Overview"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"/news",className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-news"}),!isCollapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"News"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"/conversations",className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-conversations"}),!isCollapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Conversations"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"/functions",className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-functions"}),!isCollapsed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Functions"})]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toggle-btn",onClick:toggleSidebar,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-toggle"})})]});}export default Sidebar_UI;
